attributes.action: Royal Navy to station warships at Gibraltar
attributes.additional_details:
As we are Gibraltar's defender and we have a vowed right to protect them, the Royal Navy should send warships to Gibraltar and stop Spanish incursions!

There has been 200 incursions into British Territorial Waters in the last year alone, how many more times will they have to breach our borders before we act?

The British Territory deserves protection from the Royal Navy, the Spanish should have been stopped long ago.
